page.title: 02HOMES IN FOXTON/GARTREE
page.content: The population of Foxton, Gartree and Gumley may be very small but there exists a wide range of places people live in. Foxton is a conservation area i.e.it cannot be expanded beyond it's current boundaries.Any new building can only occur in space between present buildings or if an old house is demolished. Most people are buying their homes in Foxton,although there are a few council houses at the bottom of Swingbridge Street.The Gartree prison estate,consisting of semi,terraced and detatched houses is totally owned by the Home Office. Gumley has lots of old country cottages Some people also live in mobile homes and narrow-boats at Foxton locks
